Robo 3T 1.4 now with MongoDB 4.2 support
<br/>
<style type="text/css"> a { display: block; color: #47b648; } .text-primary { font-size: 18px; color: #47b648; } p { font-size: 14px; } .button { font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; } </style><a class="button" href="https://robomongo.org/download?inappupdate">Download the new version here</a><h2 style="margin-top:16px;">Find these new features and other fixes and improvements in the latest Robo 3T release:</h2><p>    - MongoDB 4.2 support</p><p>    - mongo shell upgrade from 4.0 to 4.2</p><p>    - Ability to manually specify visible databases</p><a class="button" href="https://blog.robomongo.org/robo-3t-1-4/?inappupdate">View the full blog post</a><br/><br /><h2>Robo 3T feeling a bit underpowered? Level up to Studio 3T</h2>

<p>
    - Double-click to edit documents (instead of right-clicking every time)
</p>
<p>
    - Auto-complete collection names, field names & more in the shell
</p>
<p>
    - Import and export in CSV, JSON, SQL and BSON/mongodump
</p>
<p>
    - Build aggregation queries stage by stage
</p>
<p>
    - Write SQL to query MongoDB
</p>
<p>
    - Use a drag-and-drop UI for fast query building
</p>
<p>
    - Generate driver code in seven languages
</p>
<p>
    - Color-code databases, connections, and field types
</p>
<p>
    - Copy and paste collections and documents between databases
</p>
<p>
    - And much more
</p>
